chatbot.homeMessage:
Hello, {{name}}! I'm Bit, your virtual assistant.
How can I help you today?
chatbot.supportHome: What type of issue are you experiencing?
chatbot.softwareMessage:
Here are some recommendations for your issue!

‚Ä¢Restart the application.
‚Ä¢Clear cache or temporary data.
‚Ä¢Check for pending updates.
chatbot.hardwareMessage:
Here are some recommendations for your issue!

‚Ä¢Restart the device.
‚Ä¢Check cable connections.
‚Ä¢Test with other peripherals.
chatbot.networkMessage:
Here are some recommendations for your issue!

‚Ä¢Check your Wi-Fi connection.
‚Ä¢Try using a wired connection.
‚Ä¢Verify your VPN connection.
chatbot.accountsMessage:
Here are some recommendations for your issue!

‚Ä¢Verify your username and password.
‚Ä¢Try resetting your password.
‚Ä¢Request an account unlock.
chatbot.supportNoMessage:
I'm sorry I couldn't help resolve your issue.
You can return to the previous options, or I suggest creating a new ticket describing the problem.
chatbot.systemHome: Select one of the following options
chatbot.ticketListOption: üìã Where can I view my existing tickets?
chatbot.newTicketMessage: Go to the "Tickets" section in the main menu. There you will find the "Create Ticket" option, which will open a form to enter the required information.
chatbot.passwordMessage: You currently need assistance from an administrator to change your password. (Soon you will be able to do it on your own.)
chatbot.ticketListMessage: Go to the "Tickets" section in the main menu. There you will find the "Ticket List" option, which will display all the tickets you have reported so far, with the ability to filter them by status.
chatbot.systemNoMessage:
I'm sorry I couldn't help resolve your issue.
You can return to the previous options or contact a system administrator.
chatbot.yesMessage:
I'm so glad I could help solve your problem!
Do you need anything else?

ticketRating.valorationValidMessage: You must select a service rating within a range of 1 to 5 stars.
ticketRating.commentMaxMessage: The comment must be a maximum of 100 characters.
ticketRating.submitSucessMessage: The service rating has been submitted successfully.
ticketRating.submitErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to submit the service rating.
ticketRating.title: Service Rating
ticketRating.dialogtitle: Do you want to leave the rating screen?
ticketRating.dialogContent:
Your opinion is important to us, so we would like to know the quality of the service provided by our technical team.

If you leave this screen, you will not be able to rate the service provided for this ticket.
